name: Kokoda Track Trekking
description: Trek the historic Kokoda Track, a challenging and emotionally significant trail that traces the footsteps of World War II soldiers.

name: Mount Wilhelm Hiking
description: Ascend Mount Wilhelm, Papua New Guinea's highest peak, offering breathtaking views and diverse ecological zones.

name: Tufi Fjords Diving
description: Dive in the stunning Tufi Fjords, renowned for their pristine coral reefs, diverse marine life, and World War II wrecks.

name: Sepik River Cultural Experience
description: Explore the Sepik River, experiencing the traditional lifestyle, art, and culture of the river communities.

name: Goroka Show Cultural Festival
description: Attend the Goroka Show, a colorful cultural festival showcasing the diverse ethnic groups, dance, and music of Papua New Guinea.

name: Madang Lagoon Snorkeling
description: Snorkel in the Madang Lagoon, home to vibrant coral gardens and a variety of tropical fish species.

name: Rabaul Volcano Adventure
description: Explore the volcanic region of Rabaul, witnessing active volcanoes and the remnants of the town's historical eruptions.

name: Kavieng Surfing Experience
description: Surf the uncrowded waves of Kavieng, offering some of the best surfing experiences in Papua New Guinea.

name: Baining Fire Dance Ceremony
description: Witness the Baining Fire Dance, a unique and mesmerizing cultural ceremony performed by the Baining people.

name: Port Moresby Nature Park Visit
description: Discover the flora and fauna of Papua New Guinea at Port Moresby Nature Park, a haven for native plant and animal species.
